title: Global Sea Ice Edge (GRIB) - Multimission
summary: The Sea Ice Edge product is a classification product (open water/open ice/closed ice) and covers both the Northern and Southern Hemisphere. The sea ice edge is derived from passive microwave and active microwave sensors using a multi sensor methods with a Bayesian approach to combine the different sensors.
